projects.title: Spend Estimator
projects.description: Streamlit web app for predicting customer annual spend using machine learning algorithms.
projects.longDescription: Developed a machine learning-powered web application using Streamlit to estimate customer annual spending. Implemented various ML algorithms to ensure accurate predictions based on user-input features, aiding in targeted marketing and customer segmentation strategies.

projects.title: Books Data Analysis
projects.description: End-to-end data analysis pipeline extracting book genre data using Python and visualizing it in Power BI.
projects.longDescription: Executed a comprehensive data analysis project involving web scraping of book genre data using Python. Transformed and cleaned data using Jupyter notebooks and built interactive Power BI dashboards to visualize trends and insights in the book market.
highlights: Automated data extraction from web sources

projects.title: Store Data Analysis
projects.description: Efficient web scraping pipeline for store data extraction and transformation.
projects.longDescription: Engineered a robust web scraper with a pipeline structure to efficiently extract and transform store data from various websites. The tool is customizable and supports insightful data analysis, enabling data-driven decision-making processes.
